p: A total of 503,185 high-quality bacterial sequences and 521,549 high-quality fungi sequences were generated across all samples after sequence de-noising and quality filtering. The average number of sequences per sample for bacteria was 27,955 ± 1375 (mean ± standard deviation) and ranged from 24,825 to 31,227 per sample. The average number of sequences per sample for fungi was 28,975 ± 466 (mean ± standard deviation) and ranged from 28,072 to 29,571 per sample.
